wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.connectivity

Class ComponentInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.connectivity.ComponentInfo

  • public class ComponentInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the informations relative to a connected component in a binary image.
    Author:
    Remy Malgouyres

    • Constructor Detail

      • ComponentInfo

        public ComponentInfo(short label,
                     int numberOfPoints,
                     VoxelInt voxelRepresentant,
                     int nVoxelsOnTheBorder)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        label - label of the connected component (i.e. color in the labels image array)
        numberOfPoints - (initial) cardinality of the connected component.
        voxelRepresentant - (initial) voxel representative of the component (one voxel in the component)
        nVoxelsOnTheBorder - Number of voxels in the component which are on the the edge of the image.

      • updateBox

        public void updateBox(VoxelShort voxelInTheBox)
        Update the boundaries of the BoxROI to take into account that a given voxel must be in the box.
        Parameters:
        voxelInTheBox - A voxel that should be contained in the box.

      • incrementNumberOfPoints

        Getter

      • incrementNVoxelsOnTheeBorder

        public void incrementNVoxelsOnTheeBorder()

      • getAxisSwapped

        public void getAxisSwapped(CoordinateAxis axis1,
                           CoordinateAxis axis2)
        Allows to swap coordinates axis in the voxel's domain by modifying the attributes depending on coordinates such as m_voxelRepresentant or m_boundingBox.
        Parameters:
        axis1 - The first axis to be swapped
        axis2 - The second axis to be swapped
